title: What happened to smart cast
body:
Is it just me or is there no longer an option for enabling/disabling smart cast? Because it's hard for me to play the game without smart cast and for some reason, I can't find where to re-enable it in the settings. Help plz!
{{sticker:sg-janna}} <--- me without smart cast

replies.body: You should be able to find quick-casting under the Hotkey Settings in the client options. After picking Hotkeys on the left hand menu, at the top you'll see "Quick Cast All".
There are lighting icons under each keybinding in setting. If they are highlighted then those abilities are going to be smartcast.
